_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: HolaClient Egg V2
author: itzbenoitxd@protonmail.com
description: An egg for Pterodactyl panel usually used to install HolaClient, now updated with ❤ by amogus#6200
startup: if [[ ! -z ${NODE_PACKAGES} ]]; then /usr/local/bin/npm install ${NODE_PACKAGES}; fi; if [[ ! -z ${UNNODE_PACKAGES} ]]; then /usr/local/bin/npm uninstall ${UNNODE_PACKAGES}; fi; if [ -f /home/container/package.json ]; then /usr/local/bin/npm install; fi; /usr/local/bin/node /home/container/{{BOT_JS_FILE}}

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# NodeJS Bot Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
echo -e "Starting installation! 😀"
echo -e "Installing packages..."
apt update > /dev/null
apt install -y git curl jq file unzip make gcc g++ python python-dev libtool wget > /dev/null

echo -e "Creating server files..."
mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

## pull git js bot repo
if [ "$(ls -A /mnt/server)" ]; then
    echo -e "⚠ Warning: The /mnt/server directory is not empty."
    echo -e "To prevent issues, this script has been automatically halted."
    echo -e "If you want to update the version, download database.sqlite and settings.json, delete ALL the files, change the `Version of HolaClient` variable to a newer version of HolaClient, reinstall the server, delete the settings.json from the server and upload database.sqlite and settings.json and restart the server (optional: also change the version in the setting.json)!"
    echo -e "Frequent updates will be posted on the GitHub or announcements channel. Thanks for using my egg! -amogus"
    echo -e "=====================SOCIAL======================"
    echo -e "[+] [Discord]  https://discord.gg/CvqRH9TrYK " 
    echo -e "[+] [GitHub]  https://github.com/CR072/HolaClient "
    echo -e "[+] [HolaSMP]  https://discord.gg/Dms5dsmVAs "
    echo -e "================================================="
    exit 10
else
    echo -e "✔ /mnt/server is empty.\nDownloading and unzipping the zip..."
    wget -q https://github.com/CR072/HolaClient/releases/download/v${VERSION}/HolaClient.v${VERSION}.zip
    unzip -qq HolaClient.v${VERSION}.zip
    rm -rf HolaClient.v${VERSION}.zip
    echo -e "✔ Successfully downloaded HolaClient!"
fi

echo "Installing additional Node.JS packages..."
if [[ ! -z ${NODE_PACKAGES} ]]; then
    /usr/local/bin/npm install ${NODE_PACKAGES} --silent
fi

echo "Installing required Node.JS packages..."
if [ -f /mnt/server/package.json ]; then
    /usr/local/bin/npm install --production --silent
fi

echo -e "✔ Successfully installed HolaClient!"
echo -e "If you want to update the version, download database.sqlite and settings.json, delete ALL the files, reinstall the server, delete the settings.json from the server and upload database.sqlite and settings.json and restart the server (optional: also change the version in the setting.json)!"
echo -e "Frequent updates will be posted on the GitHub or announcements channel. Thanks for using my egg! -amogus"
echo -e "=====================SOCIAL======================"
echo -e "[+] [Discord]  https://discord.gg/CvqRH9TrYK " 
echo -e "[+] [GitHub]  https://github.com/CR072/HolaClient "
echo -e "[+] [HolaSMP]  https://discord.gg/Dms5dsmVAs "
echo -e "================================================="
exit 0

variables.name: Version of HolaClient
variables.description:
The version of HolaClient to use while installing/update HolaClient.
Default: 1.5 (might be changed in a newer version of the egg)
⚠ If you want to update the version, download database.sqlite and settings.json, delete ALL the files, change this variable to a newer version of HolaClient, reinstall the server, delete the settings.json from the server and upload database.sqlite and settings.json and restart the server (optional: also change the version in the setting.json)!

variables.name: Install additional Node.JS packages
variables.description:
Use this when you want to install additional Node.JS packages.
Default: empty
❓ Use spaces to separate packages.

variables.name: Uninstall additional Node.JS packages
variables.description:
Use this when you don't need a Node.JS package currently installed in your node_modules folder on the server.
Deafult: empty
⚠ Make sure that the packages you are uninstalling is not a essential part of HolaClient!
❓ Use spaces to separate packages.

variables.name: Index file of HolaClient
variables.description:
The index.js file used to run HolaClient.
Default: index.js
⚠ Do not modify thing variable unless you know what are you doing!
